tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pharmacokinetic_data (
    patient_id INT,
    drug_name VARCHAR(255),
    dose_amount DECIMAL,
    dose_frequency VARCHAR(50),
    plasma_concentration DECIMAL,
    absorption_rate DECIMAL,
    clearance_rate DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, drug_name)
);

CREATE TABLE pharmacokinetics_data (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  drug_id INT,
  dose FLOAT,
  plasma_concentration FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE pharmacodynamics_data (
  drug_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  efficacy_score FLOAT,
  duration_hrs INT,
  study_group VARCHAR,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE pharmacokinetic_data (
    patient_id INT,
    drug_name VARCHAR(50),
    dose_amount DECIMAL,
    time_elapsed_hours INT,
    plasma_concentration DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE dosing_regimens (
    regimen_id INT,
    drug_name VARCHAR(50),
    dosing_interval_hours INT,
    dose_amount DECIMAL,
    max_dose_per_day DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE pharmacokinetic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    drug_name VARCHAR,
    dose_amount DECIMAL,
    dose_frequency INT,
    plasma_concentration DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE pharmacodynamic_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    drug_name VARCHAR,
    efficacy_score INT,
    side_effects VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE dosing_regimens (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drug_name VARCHAR,
    dose_amount DECIMAL,
    dose_frequency INT,
    administration_route VARCHAR
);
CREATE TABLE pharmacokinetics (id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_id INT, drug_id INT, dose FLOAT, time_interval INT, plasma_concentration FLOAT)
CREATE TABLE pharmacodynamics (id INT PRIMARY KEY, drug_id INT, effect VARCHAR(255), response FLOAT)
CREATE TABLE dosing_regimens (id INT PRIMARY KEY, drug_id INT, regimen_name VARCHAR(255), dose FLOAT, administration_interval INT)
CREATE TABLE drug_efficacy (id INT PRIMARY KEY, drug_id INT, efficacy_score FLOAT, duration INT)
CREATE TABLE patients (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), age INT, weight FLOAT)
